section.p: The alchemist’s shop is lined with potions, jars of exotic substances, herbs, and so on. Alembics and beakers bubble and boil, full of strangely-coloured liquids. The alchemist, a tall, gangly fellow with a beak of a nose, sells potions. You can buy as many as you can afford - each one costs 50 Shards.

A potion can be used just before an ability roll or a fight to add 1 to the relevant ability for that one roll or fight only. Each potion can be used only once. The alchemist can make you a special potion for 250 Shards, but he needs an ink sac.
